page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: MY HOUSE IS A THREE-BEDROOMED COUNCIL HOUSE IN WATERS ROAD. WE HAVE ABOUT TWELVE ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES WHICH I THINK IS TOO MANY. I'VE GOT TWO BROTHERS AND ONE SISTER, A MUM AND A DAD. ALTOGETHER WE HAVE FOUR CARS IN THE FAMILY. TWO OLD BANGERS BOTH BELONGING TO ONE OF MY BROTHERS, A LADA BELONGS TO MY FATHER AND AN OLD B REGISTRATION MINI BELONGS TO MY OTHER BROTHER BUT MY SISTER OFTEN DRIVES IT. OUR FRONT GARDEN IS QUITE BIG AND THAT IS WHERE MY DAD USUALLY PARKS HIS CAR BUT THE TWO BANGERS ARE THERE AT THE MOMENT - ONE ON THE GRASS. WE HAVE 6 DIFFERENT SORTS OF PET AND 13 ALTOGETHER. THEY ARE 2 FERRETS, A HAMSTER, A BUDGIE, 4 STICK INSECTS, A CAT AND 4 FISH. OUR BACK GARDEN IS QUITE BIG. IT HAS A PATIO WHICH MY DAD BUILT AND A NICE LAWN.
